(a)     The Committee may hold hearings and submit recommendations to the Board of Supervisors, the Mayor, and other City officers and departments on the spending and allocation of energy efficiency funds. 
     (b)     No later than one year after the date that all seven voting members of the Committee have been appointed, the Committee shall submit to the Board of Supervisors a set of policy standards for how the City will equitably spend energy efficiency monies throughout the City. 
(Added by Ord. 78-10, File No. 091444, App. 4/16/2010)
